faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most important questions

pricing.question: How are transport costs calculated?
pricing.answer: Costs depend on distance, weight, volume and desired service level. Special transports and express shipments have individual rates. We're happy to provide you with a non-binding quote.

coverage.question: Which countries do you transport to?
coverage.answer: We serve all of Europe with focus on Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Benelux, Poland and Northern Italy. For worldwide transport, we work with reliable partners.

insurance.question: How is my shipment insured?
insurance.answer: All transports are insured by default. Coverage depends on declared goods value. Additional insurance can be arranged for valuable goods.

tracking.question: Can I track my shipment?
tracking.answer: Yes, you receive a tracking number for monitoring. For critical transports, we offer live tracking with GPS location.

dangerousGoods.question: Do you also transport dangerous goods?
dangerousGoods.answer: Yes, we are ADR-certified and transport dangerous goods of all classes. This requires special advance notifications and documentation.

deliveryTime.question: How quickly does my shipment reach its destination?
deliveryTime.answer: Standard transport within Germany: 1-2 business days. Europe: 2-5 business days. Express services available same or next day.

title: Our DNA
paragraph_2: Our success is built on three pillars: outstanding service, cutting-edge technology, and an experienced team. We understand our customers' challenges and develop tailor-made solutions for every transport need.
paragraph_3: With our headquarters in Germany and strategic partnerships across Europe, we ensure reliable and timely deliveries – from the North Sea to the Mediterranean.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.statement: We connect companies across Europe through reliable, secure, and sustainable logistics solutions. Quality, punctuality, and personal service are at the heart of everything we do.

team.title: Experienced Team
team.description: Over 50 logistics experts with years of industry experience and continuous training.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: State-of-the-art technology and continuous process optimization for maximum efficiency.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Environmentally conscious logistics with efficient routes and modern, eco-friendly vehicles.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions (AGB)
terms.intro: The following provisions govern all transport and logistics services provided by NavaTransport.

scope.title: 1. Scope of Application
scope.paragraph_1: These General Terms and Conditions (“Terms”) apply to every contract, offer, and service provided by NavaTransport in the field of transport and logistics.
scope.paragraph_2: Deviating or supplementary terms of the customer shall only become part of the contract if NavaTransport has expressly agreed to them in text form.

parties.title: 2. Contracting Parties & Contact Details
parties.paragraph_1: NavaTransport GmbH acts as the contractual partner and service provider.
parties.paragraph_2: All enquiries must be submitted via the communication channels specified in these Terms.

services.title: 3. Services & Conclusion of Contract
services.paragraph_1: Quotations issued by NavaTransport are non-binding and refer solely to the services described therein.
services.bullet_1: A contract is concluded only after written order confirmation (e.g., by email) or by execution of the service.
services.bullet_2: Changes or extensions to the scope of services require text form and may lead to adjusted fees.
services.bullet_3: Time and quantity commitments remain subject to available capacity and necessary official approvals.

customer.title: 4. Customer Obligations
customer.paragraph_1: The customer shall provide all information, documents, and access required for proper performance in due time.
customer.paragraph_2: The customer guarantees that all entrusted goods are properly packed, labelled, and free of third-party rights; mandatory permits must be obtained unless expressly agreed otherwise.

pricing.title: 5. Pricing & Payment Terms
pricing.paragraph_1: All prices are quoted net in euros plus the applicable statutory VAT unless stated otherwise.
pricing.bullet_1: Additional costs (e.g., customs, duties, waiting times, ancillary services) will be invoiced separately and borne by the customer.
pricing.bullet_2: Invoices are payable in full within 14 days from the invoice date.
pricing.bullet_3: In the event of default, the statutory default interest pursuant to Section 288 BGB applies.

delivery.title: 6. Delivery & Performance Deadlines
delivery.paragraph_1: Specified delivery and performance dates are non-binding unless expressly confirmed as binding.
delivery.paragraph_2: Force majeure, transport or operational disruptions, and official measures extend agreed deadlines by the duration of the disruption plus a reasonable restart period.

liability.title: 7. Liability & Insurance
liability.bullet_1: NavaTransport is liable for damages only in cases of intent, gross negligence, or breach of essential contractual obligations.
liability.bullet_2: In cases of slight negligence of a cardinal duty, liability is limited to foreseeable, typical damage.
liability.bullet_3: Statutory liability limits under the German Commercial Code (HGB) and applicable international conventions apply to cargo damage.
liability.bullet_4: The customer must declare the value of the goods and arrange additional transport insurance if higher coverage is required.

complaints.title: 8. Complaints & Notification of Defects
complaints.paragraph_1: Obvious defects must be reported without undue delay, at the latest within 7 calendar days after delivery; hidden defects must be notified within 7 calendar days after discovery.

withdrawal.title: 9. Withdrawal & Termination Rights
withdrawal.bullet_1: Consumers within the meaning of Section 13 BGB have a statutory right of withdrawal pursuant to the applicable legal provisions.
withdrawal.bullet_2: Entrepreneurs within the meaning of Section 14 BGB have no withdrawal right; any termination or rescission rights must be expressly agreed.

dataProtection.title: 10. Data Protection
dataProtection.paragraph_1: NavaTransport processes personal data strictly in accordance with the statutory requirements of the GDPR.
dataProtection.paragraph_2: Further details are available in our

final.title: 11. Final Provisions
final.bullet_1: The laws of the Federal Republic of Germany apply, excluding the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods (CISG).
final.bullet_2: Place of performance and jurisdiction for merchants is the registered office of NavaTransport.
final.bullet_3: Should any provision be or become invalid, the remaining provisions remain in force; the parties shall agree on a valid provision that best reflects the economic intent.
